premise_source_doc_sentence: Ankerich 's interviews with the last remaining silent film stars were featured in Broken Silence : Conversations With 23 Silent Film Stars  (  1993  )  and The Sound of Silence : Conversations with 16 Film and Stage Personalities Who Made the Transition from Silents to Talkies  (  1998  )  .
His biography of silent film actress Mae Murray , Mae Murray : The Girl with the Bee-Stung Lips , was named one of the top 10 must-read film books of 2012 .
Michael G. Ankerich is a biographer whose work focuses on American silent film and early twentieth century actors and actresses .
